title: 手臂机器人:机器人检测物体与运动规划
id: 2020/04/17/手臂机器人:机器人检测物体与运动规划/
summary:
Task通过机械臂分类不同颜色的立方体:

检测物体，立方体和杯子。.
确定立方体和杯子在三维空间中的位置和颜色。
生成机器手臂的Motion Plan然后实施。

立方体和杯子首先根据深度信息来识别的，深度信息相同的再信息高度信息区分，然后使用颜色信息将立方体分类到各自的有色杯子中。

Overall algorithmClustering algorithm -
Clustering uses the flood fill algorithm to form clusters based on the colour information.

For all the points in the pruned points: Check if the point is already visited, if not visited then start flood fill algorithm from this point.
Check if the number of points in the segment formed by the flood fill is greater than a threshold, then add the segment to a list. At the end we have segments having similar color.
